titleInfo.title: A Monte Carlo study of the [beta]-function of the SU(3) Wilson action

mods.abstract: We discuss the behaviour of the [beta]-function of the standard SU(3) Wilson action at intermediate couplings. Results obtained from measuments of the deconfinement temperature and string tension on large lattices are compared with those obtained from a systematically optimized Monte Carlo Renormalization Group method
